name: cider
title: Cider
description: The official Raycast Cider extension, use this extension to control your playback including play/pause, shuffle, search for new songs, and more!
author: cryptofyre

commands.name: play
commands.title: Play
commands.description: Continues or starts playback from where you last left off.

commands.name: pause
commands.title: Pause
commands.description: Pauses playback where you last left off.

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search
commands.description: Search for a Song to play using MusicKit search functions.

commands.name: toggle-infinite
commands.title: Toggle Infinite
commands.description: Toggles the infinite queue in Cider

commands.name: skip
commands.title: Skip
commands.description: Skips the current song and plays the next one (if applicable) in the queue.

commands.name: back
commands.title: Back
commands.description: Returns to the previous played song.

commands.name: love
commands.title: Love
commands.description: Marks the current song as loved.

commands.name: add
commands.title: Add
commands.description: Adds the currently playing song to library.

commands.name: add-to-playlist
commands.title: Add To Playlist
commands.description: Adds the currently playing song to a playlist defined by the user.

commands.name: start-radio
commands.title: Start Radio
commands.description: Creates a radio station based on the currently playing song.

commands.name: show-album
commands.title: Show Album
commands.description: Prompts Cider to open and show the current album for the current song.

commands.name: dislike
commands.title: Dislike
commands.description: Marks the current song as disliked.
